Item.Value: [Text:Oh thank Heavens! Have you seen a girl named $NPC_0$? She's about this tall, short brown hair and has a permanent scowl? You have?! Thank you! So this is where she ran off to is it? My name is $NPC_8$, I'm her aunt and guardian. She gave me the slip a week ago. I'd be grateful if you could build me a house.][UnlockBuildingID:66][Name:Introduction]
[Text:You seem to be in a rush, don't let me keep you. I hope you have a good day.][Default][Name]
[Text:Hello, $Name$. Could you talk to $1$ for me by any chance? I worry about her, always pushing herself so hard.][Default][Name:2]

[Text:Well, if I'm to stay here i suppose I'll need to find a way to earn my keep. I'm not too bad witha needle and thread. I'm sure $NPC_13$ could design a shop for me or something.][Default][Priority:50][Once][ShopTargetID:2][UnlockItemID:139][Name:Tailor request]
